publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4004 Ross Finnie: The Draft Water Environment (Consequential and Savings Provisions) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Water Environment (Consequential and Savings Provisions) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*

S2M-4004 Ross Finnie: The Draft Water Environment (Consequential and Savings Provisions) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Water Environment (Consequential and Savings Provisions) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin
